title: Hicks high on the idea of Clemens
subtitle: Hicks high on idea of Clemens
body: Rangers owner Tom Hicks is more than satisfied with what his team has accomplished this offseason with the additions of pitchers Kevin Millwood, Vicente Padilla, Adam Eaton and Akinori Otsuka, and outfielder Brad Wilkerson.  But there is still one addition that the Rangers would like to make before they are through.  Roger Clemens. T.R. Sullivan is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: T.R. Sullivan
